website_summaries.verdict: This eye-catching sink is a little expensive, but it's a perfect conversation piece in a rustic kitchen.
pros: Large capacity suitable for big households
cons: Pricey compared to the other models listed here
Prone to staining and color changing

website_summaries.verdict: The best budget copper farmhouse sink to use in your kitchen when a classic, rustic look is desired.
pros: Handmade copper base is resistant to light scrapes and scratches commonly experienced while washing dishes
Copper retains its color and tone as it ages
cons: The sink must be wiped periodically to clear sitting water that may ruin the copper finish

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful even the second time around- you need to be OK with patina or it's not for you.
customer_reviews.text: We did a kitchen renovation 3 years ago and I had this sink installed. Then we moved and I hated leaving it behind. So... we did another renovation in our new kitchen and I bought the same one again. Came in without a scratch. Works great and I love the patina we get from it. It fit our old home and fits this one just as well. If you're not a patina friend, don't get it. It changes color and ages ... we love the character and feel it suits our soapstone counters and ivory cabinets... we went with brushed nickel hardware including the drain. Beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: angela m gagne

customer_reviews.title: gorgeous, but remember it's handmade
customer_reviews.text: This sink is gorgeous, the pictures do not do it justice. It feels very sturdy but not unmanageable to install with two people. I just installed this last night and the only complaint I have is that the nature of a handmade sink is that not all the sides lay flat to the counter. I installed this as a top mount over new wooden counters and there are spots I had to hammer down because the lip sits too far above the counter. Other than that this is great and I can't wait to use this.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Arcs

customer_reviews.title: Price and quality great
customer_reviews.text: We've had this sink for a couple of years now and we love it. The inside of the sink will lose it's dark brown finish and will get swirls of bright copper for a few days before going back to a darker color. It won't turn back into the dark brown it was finished with at the factory but it does get darker. We're fine with it looking interesting in our kitchen but that might not work for everyone. The price and quality of this sink is great.
customer_reviews.author: 5HappyCampers

customer_reviews.title: High maintenance but beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful sink but it is more for looks! I’ve had my sink for one week and if you don’t wipe the water out it’s stains the inside now I’m worried if this is already happening within the first week what will it look like in the near future ?
customer_reviews.author: HannahJ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: After many years we decided to remodel our kitchen. I saw this sink and instantly fell in love ( without really seeing it) when it arrived I was so HAPPY!! The sink is installed and its the most commented on in my kitchen! Its been in about 3 months now! So far so good. Its absolutely beautiful !
customer_reviews.author: Tammy68

customer_reviews.title: great company
customer_reviews.text: Great sink so far copper is a little finicky and finish changes must keep clean but I new this going in. This is a Sinkology sink and the company is great if you send them a picture of the installed sink they will send you a free maintainer kit that helps seal the sink finish. Sometimes you see these promo items and nothing comes from it, but Sinkology sent the kit in a weeks time.
customer_reviews.author: TnT Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Put this in my kitchen when we did a full remodel about a year ago. Still looks great, very happy with decision to purchase this one. I do not do anything special to take care of it, I just avoid using bleach or any harsh chemicals on it.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking sink
customer_reviews.text: Nice sink, looks good. after getting it found it might be cheaper just to buy the kit off the home depot site which comes with everything you will need like the faucet, sink drain, bottom grid and sealant if interested in what im talking about search (Model # K1A-1004-F529-D) on homedepot website
customer_reviews.author: T-rav

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this SINK
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this SINK, but it does tarnish as it is copper. Do not leave food or dishes in it too long or you will need to clean it as rings and stains set in fairly quickly. Other than that we love it. This sink will definitely make a wonderful statement in your home. People always compliment on the sink when they walk into the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Love it. The staining and color change is part ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. The staining and color change is part of the allure. I ordered the "used like new" which required a bit more hammering to make straight in cabinet. Centerpiece of kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob I Pedersen-Foiada

customer_reviews.title: If you are really tall you might not like it as it sits pretty low in the cabinets ...
customer_reviews.text: Huge! changes the whole kitchen - would include a pic but backsplash etc not up yet, If you are really tall you might not like it as it sits pretty low in the cabinets because its so deep - Personally I wouldn't change a thing it looks fantastic and is so much more functional than my old 2 bowl sink.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great look
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, in our kitchen for 2 years now. It is a tad difficult to maintain as it discolores easily and requires special products.. after taking care of it for so long, I kind if wish I bought a ceramic one.... but we get a lot of complements on its appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Ania

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my sink it's beautiful!! The pictures do not do it justice, I am impatiently waiting for my cabinets to be installed so I can use it and I will update my review once it's broken in, but I have no doubt it will be my favorite kitchen sink ever.
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Remodeled our kitchen and bought this and part of our new look. Be sure to by the grate that goes in the bottom. Beautiful sink
customer_reviews.author: James Mullen

customer_reviews.title: Curious on dark spots
customer_reviews.text: Love this sink! But curious after installing got dark spots like water marks or something I guess that is normal but wondering how long it took for everyone's to even out or if that happen to anyone else thank you
customer_reviews.author: Matt trella

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful sink! Arrive sooner than predicted. Would give 5 stars if mounting hardware was included.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa L Darke

customer_reviews.title: After seeing some customer photos we were nervous this would ...
customer_reviews.text: After seeing some customer photos we were nervous this would be dented. However it was packed extremely well. Can't wait to install it in our new home. It's gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: Josh H.

customer_reviews.title: Received 2 dented sinks
customer_reviews.text: Sink looks beautiful, but arrived with a dented corner on the front. Exchanged it for a second which showed up with a few dents on the front apron. Wanted to love it, but couldn't chance exchanging it again for another damaged sink.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: This sink is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love my farmhouse sink! My advice is that you should not leave dishes in this sink due to its copper finish.
customer_reviews.author: Amy King

customer_reviews.title: GORGEOUS SINK
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this sink!! Highly recommend. Gorgeous and durable!!
customer_reviews.author: E. Porche

customer_reviews.title: Sinkology did great!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful huge sink. Was received undamaged and in tip top shape. Havent installed it yet but have received numerous compliments already. Cant wait to have it installed. Will add photo when its in its home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great looking rustic copper sink
customer_reviews.text: this sink looks great i this new kitchen and matches my copper hood. however it if you don't take good care of it will oxidize. over all very satisfied with this sink!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Chmelar

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this sink. Everyone comments on this sink when they visit! Perfect size!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: We really wanted this sink to work. For the ...
customer_reviews.text: We really wanted this sink to work. For the price, it's hard to beat but they kept arriving dented so we had to return.
customer_reviews.author: LisaG

customer_reviews.title: COPPER FARM SINK
customer_reviews.text: WE BOUGHT THIS FOR OUR RETIREMENT HOME THAT IS IN THE PROCESS OF BEING BUILT. IT IS ABSOLUTELY GORGEOUS AND WE ARE LOOKING FORWARD TO ITS INSTALLATION THIS SUMMER.
customer_reviews.author: D. Marroletti

customer_reviews.title: we finally found a great one. It's beautiful in my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: After swapping out sinks 3 times due to dents and scratches, we finally found a great one. It's beautiful in my kitchen. Holds up very well to all the dishes we do.
customer_reviews.author: C. K

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! Well made and functional
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Well made and functional. If you want the look of copper for your kitchen, this is a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: And we LOVE this sink
customer_reviews.text: While the description said no cosmetic damage, there WAS a ding in it. But we were able to bend it out. And we LOVE this sink.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Williams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: More beautiful in person. It is the centerpiece in our kitchen. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Jon C.

customer_reviews.title: Super nice
customer_reviews.text: This sink is amazing! Looks so nice in my kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Leasure

customer_reviews.title: Discoloration easily
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. Seems to discolor easily though. Prob our fault
customer_reviews.author: Richard W Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Buy a copper cleaner !!! Water stains it looks dingy.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sink . Best price around . Not as thick as I would of like . Good size .
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Good sink but check for damage.
customer_reviews.text: sink is beautiful. The supports had a broken weld. There was no time to wait for a replacement. We worked out a fix-it solution on the spot.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Brackenridge

customer_reviews.title: slight damage but will work great for my greenhouse
customer_reviews.text: was as expected, slight damage but will work great for my greenhouse.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Judy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This sink is more beautiful in person. Cannot wait to install it in my new house. Great quality and Price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's an attractive sink. I have had issues with ...
customer_reviews.text: It's an attractive sink. I have had issues with hard water stains that seem impossible to remove. When the patina is removed by acidic food it returns naturally and quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Triggs

customer_reviews.title: It arrived in perfect condition, and I am loving how big it ...
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about this sink. It arrived in perfect condition, and I am loving how big it is.
customer_reviews.author: jessicatb

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!!!! Everyone that walks into our new kitchen immediately goes to the sink in awe. Lots of compliments
customer_reviews.author: Joy DeSimpelaere

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Buy the wax to polish and protect. I fought it turning patina until I started waxing it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to the freshly remodeled kitchen . Always a conversation piece .
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Focal point of our kitchen :)
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sink. Patina is very pretty. Darker than I expected, but still pretty, living sink. I love how big it is. I can fit anything in it, mop buckets, crock pots, large bowls. Easy to upkeep.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: I love this sink! Many people are coming by to see our new house and are sooooo impressed with the hammered copper sink. I am, too! Just simply love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It stains WAY too easy! While it is beautiful from a distance
customer_reviews.text: I don't think I would go with this again. It stains WAY too easy! While it is beautiful from a distance, when you look inside it is stained. I just got it a few months ago. Sigh...
customer_reviews.author: Gayle

customer_reviews.title: it was ok
customer_reviews.text: It was much shiner and lighter in color than I expected but pretty
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: solid and beautiful. Next purchase is a copper hood
customer_reviews.text: This sink is exactly what we wanted, solid and beautiful. Next purchase is a copper hood.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel D. Vigil

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, its the centerpiece we hoped it would be, craftsmanship outstanding, our alternative was $3,000, great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Sorensen

customer_reviews.title: Its absolutely beautiful - I am looking forward to gettin it installed
customer_reviews.text: Its absolutely beautiful - I am looking forward to gettin it installed. I have been showing it off for weeks in its box. M
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: not installed yet, but it is a gorgeous sink. can't wait to get the Kitchen remodel underway.
customer_reviews.author: Peter M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the sink, it was everything I was hoping for and expected!
customer_reviews.author: Froland

customer_reviews.title: This is an EXCELLENT price. It is the highlight of our kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This sink is gorgeous. This is an EXCELLENT price. It is the highlight of our kitchen.Be warned- It will require more care than a stainless steel sink. Acidic liquids will leave a shiny mark on the antique finish that takes some time to fill in again. It really should be wiped out and dried after each use. That said, even with the spots and such, this sink is absolutely stunning.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sink! Everyone loves it and it's a great size!
customer_reviews.author: Rivas Family

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Customer likes after our company installed it. We are a general contractor in md
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The sink looks much better out of the box than it does in pictures
customer_reviews.text: The sink looks much better out of the box than it does in pictures. It is heavy and well made. I think this was a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: L Dub

customer_reviews.title: Thin and lightweight but looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: This sink is very lightweight, the copper is THIN. Any dishes hitting the sink echos a loud noise. Ours was also dented in the front. We used it anyway, didn't want to hold up ordering counters, etc. It's not terrible. Also it wasn't a perfect rectangle. Our contractor had to cut part of it and sand it down to fit it right. That being said it does look nice, it's just not as sturdy as I was hoping. We have not used it at all yet, I hope it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: j47

customer_reviews.title: but it is absolutely beautiful! Extremely well made
customer_reviews.text: I have not gotten this sink installed yet (new kitchen is still under construction), but it is absolutely beautiful! Extremely well made. I can't wait to use it.
customer_reviews.author: ZooZoo

customer_reviews.title: Sink really classes up the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This sink is absolutely beautiful. It really adds a design element to our kitchen. I've only just installed it, so I'm not sure yet how it will hold up, but I've applied the Copper Armor, and plan to treat it monthly. We had planned to replace our Corian countertops, even though they are in good shape, because I just don't like them. But with this sink in place, I don't notice how much I hate the Corian at all.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Bray

customer_reviews.title: ... our new home about 3 months ago and I love my sink
customer_reviews.text: We moved into our new home about 3 months ago and I love my sink. It is the focal point and conversation piece of the kitchen. You should be warned, however, that it will get dark and light spots on pretty much a daily basis. The only thing I wish I had selected was a split sink w/75/25 split but that's not the sinks fault.
customer_reviews.author: Traci Marcum

customer_reviews.title: Love the patina on this sink
customer_reviews.text: Love the patina on this sink! Beautiful but hand made which means be sure to instruct your countertop installer about the chance of it not being exactly square. Our installer scribed the sink upside down, which meant when he installed the countertop, he had to re-do because it was off by 1/2" or more...important and costly lesson. Beautiful now! Love the look!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Reiner

customer_reviews.title: Looks Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: This sink Looks amazing!!! Packaging was great,no dents. We have not installed it yet but everything looks great so far!!!
customer_reviews.author: Coffeetime

customer_reviews.title: copper sink
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this sink and it is beautiful, HOWEVER, it does turn green and brown with daily use. We are able to clean it with Bar Keepers Friend and it does restore to its original color. I only gave it 4 stars because of the false advertising. I assumed that it had a protective coating or something on it so that it actually didn't turn green with normal use.
customer_reviews.author: eyearedan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sink for the price. Easy to install with badger garbage disposal.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Eckenrode

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Functional, Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: This sink is one of the focal points of our newly remodeled kitchen, getting the most "ooo's and ahhh's from our friends and family! It is so beautiful and more than I had even hoped for in terms of function. It is easy to clean, but I have to remind my husband to keep the harsh pot cleaners away because they leave a horrible residue. I am hoping the Cleaning Kit from the company will help to protect the finish and keep it looking beautiful .I priced other sinks and this one was by far the best price and is high quality workmanship. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: hospicern

customer_reviews.title: This sink is everything I wanted and more! It's ...
customer_reviews.text: This sink is everything I wanted and more! It's absolutely gorgeous. It's big enough for my 18 month old granddaughter to play in and she loves it! If you're thinking about this sink, go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: I love the sink and it is truly exactly what I ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the sink and it is truly exactly what I want for my log cabin house.....but it arrived damaged. I read the reviews on this product before I purchased it and someone wrote a review saying the same thing. He returned and got another one to find out it was damaged again. I hope I don't have to go through what he did. It appears to be packed well but the box is bulky and most likely not easy for someone to carry and probably gets thrown around. Frangile stickers to make the courier aware might be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very pleased with this gorgeous centerpiece in our new kitchen
customer_reviews.text: We love our sink. We built our home and have had several parties to celebrate. Everyone compliments the sink. We put it in a huge island and it is definitely heavily used. It does have a finish on it that gives it the rustic darker color. It gets scratches and wear and now has fresh bright copper shining through those areas. I love that. We designed our home to feel rustic and this sink fits perfect. We plan on living here forever and I'm very excited to see how the sink changes over the years. The apron front will receive a lot of wear and will take on its own look. This is a great deal. Buy this sink!
customer_reviews.author: CMS

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend before using the sink
customer_reviews.text: The sink looks incredible installed. The only problem we're having is if we leave a dish in the sink overnight, the link develops an odd discoloration for a few days and then it goes away. Maybe its normal, I'm not sure. I would recommend before using the sink, clean it with Premier Copper Products W900-WAX Copper Sink and Cleaner, Clear. We'll probably end up purchasing sink grate to place a bottom of the sink so this doesn't happen again.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Magana

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL!
customer_reviews.text: Love our beautiful sink! It makes the kitchen! Best price.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Weitzman

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: This is an undermount sink. Not a farm front as advertised. Returned
customer_reviews.author: Jenni Woodruff

product_meta.title: Adams Farmhouse Apron Front Handmade Copper Kitchen Sink 33 in. Single Bowl in Antique Copper
product_meta.description:
The Adams copper apron kitchen sink is handcrafted from the finest 16 gauge pure copper by Sinkology’s team of skilled artisans. The flexible and functional design of each sink offers a wide range for any look. With clear-cut installation and easy to maintain care, all sinks from Sinkology are designed for everyday living, while adding a point of pride to your home. The large single bowl designs offers plenty of space for any kitchen and is guaranteed to be the highlight of your kitchen.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Adams copper apron kitchen sink is handcrafted from the finest 16 gauge pure copper by Sinkology’s team of skilled artisans. The flexible and functional design of each sink offers a wide range for any look. With clear-cut installation and easy to maintain care, all sinks from Sinkology are designed for everyday living, while adding a point of pride to your home. The large single bowl designs offers plenty of space for any kitchen and is guaranteed to be the highlight of your kitchen.
feature_bullets: Commercial Grade - 16 Gauge Pure Solid Copper .063 - .068 thickness
Hammered front apron wraps 2 in. on each side
Sinkology Copper Sinks Will NOT turn green with typical indoor use
Extra 30 in x 19 in large capacity single bowl, helps make cleanup easy

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars109 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
